name: Within The Light
description:
Within the Light is a 2d platformer about a shadow that is trying to rescue stars. 

  • Shadow is a shadow puppet that can only exist if the moon shines enough light.
    • Control the moon (and its light) with your mouse movement.
  • Move as Shadow through the darkness with the A (left) key and the D (right) key. 
  • Rescue stars and exit each level with the W key. And jump with SPACE.

Thanks for playing our game!

- Urodela and Darkrunner
